sections.heading: Property
sections.text:
rights of a married couple governed by chapter; exceptions; rights vested

before March 10, 1873, not affected.

sections.heading: Curtesy
sections.text: and dower not allowed.

sections.heading: How
sections.text: a married couple may hold property.

sections.heading: Spouse
sections.text: not liable for debts of other incurred before marriage.

sections.heading: No
sections.text: interests in property of other.

sections.heading: Spouses
sections.text: may make contracts.

sections.heading: Contract
sections.text:
altering legal relations: Separation agreement; consideration; introduction in

evidence in divorce action.

sections.heading: Necessaries
sections.text:
provided to neglected spouse when neglecting spouse neglects to provide;

recovery of value.

sections.heading: Abandoned
sections.text: spouse not liable for support of abandoning spouse.

sections.heading: When
sections.text: spouse must support other spouse.

sections.heading: Segregation
sections.text: of damage awards when spouses sue jointly.

sections.heading: Character
sections.text: of property transferred into trust.

sections.heading: Separate
sections.text: property of each spouse.

sections.heading: Inventory
sections.text: of separate property: Execution; recording; supplemental inventory.

sections.heading: Recording
sections.text: of inventory is notice and evidence of title.

sections.heading: Effect
sections.text: of failure to record inventory.

sections.heading: Each
sections.text: spouse controls own separate property.

sections.heading: Property
sections.text: and earnings of minor children.

sections.heading: Earnings
sections.text:
of either spouse appropriated to own use pursuant to written authorization of

other spouse deemed gift.

sections.heading: Community
sections.text: property defined.

sections.heading: Interests
sections.text: of each spouse in community property are present, existing and equal interests.

sections.heading: Control
sections.text: of community property.

sections.heading: Payments
sections.text:
or refunds under benefit or savings plans to employees, beneficiaries or

estates: Discharge of employer, trustee or insurance company from adverse

claims; notice.

sections.heading: Ownership
sections.text: of survivor upon death of spouse; disposal by will of decedent.

sections.heading: Division
sections.text: of income and resources of married couple: Manner; conditions; restrictions.

sections.heading: Contracts
sections.text: or settlements to be written and acknowledged.

sections.heading: Recording
sections.text: in counties where real property situated.

sections.heading: Record
sections.text: of contract to impart notice.

sections.heading: Effect
sections.text: of not recording contract or settlement.

sections.heading: Minors
sections.text: may make marriage contracts or settlements.
